knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(lubridate)
library(zoo)
```



```{r}
land.temps <- read.csv('GlobalLandTemperaturesByCountry.csv')
head(land.temps)
land.temps$dt <- as.Date(land.temps$dt)
land.temps
```
```{r}
NA.temps <- as.data.frame(land.temps[land.temps$Country == 'North America',])
rownames(NA.temps) <- 1:nrow(NA.temps)
na.temps <- NA.temps[1577:2940,]

SA.temps <- land.temps[land.temps$Country == 'South America',]
rownames(SA.temps) <- 1:nrow(SA.temps)
sa.temps <- SA.temps[589:1952,]

AF.temps <- land.temps[land.temps$Country == 'Africa',]
rownames(AF.temps) <- 1:nrow(AF.temps)
af.temps <- AF.temps[601:1964,]


EU.temps <- land.temps[land.temps$Country == 'Europe',]
rownames(EU.temps) <- 1:nrow(EU.temps)
eu.temps <- EU.temps[1875:3238,]


AS.temps <- land.temps[land.temps$Country == 'Asia',]
rownames(AS.temps) <- 1:nrow(AS.temps)
as.temps <- AS.temps[1006:2369,]


AU.temps <- land.temps[land.temps$Country == 'Australia',]
rownames(AU.temps) <- 1:nrow(AU.temps)
au.temps <- AU.temps[571:1934,]


```




```{r}
NA.ts <- ts(na.temps$AverageTemperature, frequency = 12) 
SA.ts <- ts(sa.temps$AverageTemperature, frequency = 12) 
AF.ts <- ts(af.temps$AverageTemperature, frequency = 12) 
EU.ts <- ts(eu.temps$AverageTemperature, frequency = 12) 
AS.ts <- ts(as.temps$AverageTemperature, frequency = 12) 
AU.ts <- ts(au.temps$AverageTemperature, frequency = 12) 
```


```{r}
plot.ts(NA.ts, xlab = 'Time', ylab = 'Average Temperature', bty = 'l', ylim = c(-20, 40))
```


```{r}
plot.ts(SA.ts, xlab = 'Time', ylab = 'Average Temperature', bty = 'l', ylim = c(-20, 40))
```


```{r}


plot.ts(AF.ts, xlab = 'Year', ylab = 'Average Temperature', bty = 'l', ylim = c(-20, 40))



```

```{r}
plot.ts(EU.ts, xlab = 'Time', ylab = 'Average Temperature', bty = 'l', ylim = c(-20, 40))
```



```{r}
plot.ts(AS.ts, xlab = 'Time', ylab = 'Average Temperature', bty = 'l', ylim = c(-20, 40))
```

```{r}
plot.ts(AU.ts, xlab = 'Time', ylab = 'Average Temperature', bty = 'l', ylim = c(-20, 40))
```
